name: Straight Drifting!
description: this is a game where u can Drift Straight with a Car! Do not touch the building or u will die. BTW there a bug when ggoing way to far the car starts going down until u aint seeing it anymore. And the Game is a little laggy and buggy but its not my problem. OH, Also theres a secret button where u can play like fortnite and minecraft! and thats it! HAVE A GOOD TIME!
